title: Slovakia Retail Sales YoY
description: Retail Sales in Slovakia decreased 4.90 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Retail Sales YoY in Slovakia averaged 2.87 percent from 1996 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 28.60 percent in April of 1999 and a record low of -16.80 percent in January of 2021. In Slovakia, the year-over-year change in Retail sales compares the aggregated sales of retail goods and services during a certain month to the same month a year ago. This page provides - Slovakia Retail Sales YoY - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Statistical Office of the Slovak Republic
